title: Benihana offers signature cocktails including Benihana Punch and Mai Tai
statement: Benihana's signature cocktail menu includes Benihana Punch, Mai Tai, Sake Sangria, Blue Ocean, and Rocky's Margarita.

citations.quote: SIGNATURE COCKTAILS SELECT ONE: • BENIHANA PUNCH • MAI TAI • SAKE SANGRIA • BLUE OCEAN • ROCKY'S MARGARITA
